titleStmt.title: A proclamation for the obseruation of certein statutes with a fourme howe the same shal be executed, and a summarye abridgement of euery of the same statutes, folowing.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.
England and Wales. Laws, etc.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Povvles Church yarde by Rycharde Jugge and John Cawood, printers to the Quenes Maiestie],

notesStmt.note: Special t.p.: A collection of the substaunce of certaine necessary statutes, to be by justices of the peace diligently executed, within euery shire of the realm.
Place of publication and publisher from colophon.
Reproduction of original in the Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
